meanings.definition: A ghost or ghostlike image of a person.
meanings.sent1: The apparition of the friendly ghost appeared in the old house.
meanings.sent2: The apparition of a loved one can bring comfort to some people.
meanings.sent3: The apparition of the ghost made everyone at the party jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The apparition of memories haunted her mind like a ghostly presence.
meanings.sent5: The apparition of the lost child was said to wander the forest at night.

meanings.definition: The act of appearing or becoming visible.
meanings.sent1: The sudden apparition of the sun from behind the clouds brightened the day.
meanings.sent2: The apparition of the moon signaled the beginning of the night.
meanings.sent3: The apparition of the teacher at the park surprised the students.
meanings.sent4: The apparition of hope in her eyes shone brightly despite the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The apparition of the rainbow after the storm brought joy to all who saw it.
